items.title: Trump administration’s ban on foreign-made drones starts this week — you can say goodbye to new DJI models
items.description: It's the latest development in an evolving war between Chinese and American consumer tech products.

items.title: ServiceNow to acquire cybersecurity startup Armis for $7.75B
items.description: The deal is expected to yield significant returns for Armis investors, including Sequoia, CapitalG, and Insight Partners.

items.title: Zoox issues software recall over lane crossings
items.description: The company has issued a software update to its autonomous driving system to fix its lane-crossing behavior.

items.title: John Carreyrou and other authors bring new lawsuit against six major AI companies
items.description: These authors rejected Anthropic's class action settlement, arguing that "LLM companies should not be able to so easily extinguish thousands upon thou...

items.title: Hackers stole over $2.7B in crypto in 2025, data shows
items.description: This was another banner year for crypto hacks and heists — 2025 was the third year in a row that a new crypto theft record was set.
